title: Player bans
body:
Is it possible to submit a ticket or post to aid in banning a player?
The system seems to work occasionally but my understanding is it needs a certain amount of bans and from both teams and I know quite often people just rq the end screen or straight up forget.

I know people have bad games or do dumb shit sometimes but when someone is toxic and trolling from the very beginning of the game and obviously went into the game intending to lose it seems the end screen report isn't enough. Even shit like gg spamming when we are ahead. I know there is mute but not everyone will do it and whole team ends up getting tilted.

Shit like that makes me wanna stop playing just wanna know if there is anything else to do.
Cheers

replies.body:
Actually, a single report is enough to trigger a review. The validity of that report (or reports, if there are multiple) is then determined and punishment(s) dished out accordingly. As long as you are reporting these kinds of players that you encounter, the system should be able to work on those individuals.

Although, if you feel like your report in the post-game isn't enough you do have the option of submitting a ticket to [support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) with any evidence (screenshots/videos, for example) you may have.
